nodes.text: Clan Chorn was a clan of Mandalorians in existence at the time of the Eternal Empire's invasion of the galaxy. When Mandalore the Avenger rallied the clans in an attack on the Eternal Empire's droid factory on Darvannis, Clan Chorn was one of the clans able to aid her.

Clan Chorn was first introduced to Star Wars Legends in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire. The clan was featured in a choice given to the player during Chapter XIV, Mandalore's Revenge, where the player could choose between sacrificing or saving Clan Chorn when they are outflanked by Skytroopers.
